storyThreads.title: The Awakening

beats.summary: The Awakening: Strange creatures appear at night.

potentialOutcomes: The evil is resealed, but weakened watchers remain.
The evil is destroyed at tremendous cost.
The evil proves to be misunderstoodnot evil at all.
The evil escapes and begins its conquest.
A bargain is struck with the awakened power.

storyThreads.title: The hex:1,4 Curse
storyThreads.summary: A curse has fallen upon hex:1,4or upon Carpus.

beats.summary: Victims seek relief. Carpus remains driven by personal vendetta.

potentialOutcomes: The curse is broken. Freedom restored.
The curse claims its victim.
The curse is transferred to another.
The curse proves to be a blessing in disguise.
Living with the curse proves manageable.

storyThreads.title: Blood on the Trail
storyThreads.summary: A deadly game of cat and mouse unfolds near Halivaara.

beats.summary: Trade routes near Halivaara grow dangerous
The quarry turns the tables, becoming the Miniain.

potentialOutcomes: The quarry is slain.
The quarry escapes to parts unknown.
The hunters become the hunted.
An unexpected alliance forms.
The quarry is captured alivebut for what purpose?

storyThreads.title: Malediction
storyThreads.summary: Day by day, the curse tightens its grip.
potentialOutcomes: The curse is broken. Freedom restored.
The curse claims its victim.
The curse is transferred to another.
The curse proves to be a blessing in disguise.
Living with the curse proves manageable.

storyThreads.title: The Hunt for Pericleia
storyThreads.summary: A deadly game of cat and mouse unfolds near Drumwardine.

beats.summary: Trade routes near Drumwardine grow dangerous
Tracks are found. The quarry draws near.

potentialOutcomes: The quarry is slain.
The quarry escapes to parts unknown.
The hunters become the hunted.
An unexpected alliance forms.
The quarry is captured alivebut for what purpose?

storyThreads.title: Quarantine
storyThreads.summary: The sick are shunned. The healthy live in fear.

beats.summary: The sickness spreads. Acestes remains seeks justice and righteousness.

potentialOutcomes: A cure is found. The plague ends.
The plague burns itself outbut at terrible cost.
The plague spreads to new regions.
The plague proves to be deliberate.
Immunity emerges among survivors.

storyThreads.title: The Wandering Merchants Raid
storyThreads.summary: Hit and run tactics terrorize Halivaara.
potentialOutcomes: The raid succeeds with heavy plunder.
The raiders are intercepted and destroyed.
The raid escalates into open war.
The raiders demand tribute to stop.

storyThreads.title: The Peatsland Haunting
storyThreads.summary: The dead do not rest peacefully in Peatsland.
potentialOutcomes: The spirits are laid to rest.
The haunting intensifies to lethal levels.
Coexistence is negotiated.
The ghosts reveal crucial information.
The "haunting" proves to have mortal origins.
